local_intent: Detect and align to milk_box, open gripper, push it 0.15m at 0 degrees, then verify visibility.
assumptions: Push path on the tabletop is clear
milk_box is pushable on a flat surface
Vision can detect milk_box during and after push
coherence_with_global: Follows global flow Detect -> Align -> OpenGripper -> Push with identical parameters; adds a visibility check as minimal verification while omitting wait/retreat to keep focus on the push micro-goal.
